title: Ep 2208 -Popatlal Asks Jethalal To Not Criticize Sundar
shortDesc: Iyer tells his neighbours that sooner or later Sundar would become a successful businessman. Jethalal replies Iyer that Sundat will not be able to run his shop. Popatlal advises Jethalal to not criticize Sundar.

title: Ep 2209 - Sundar Comes To Mumbai
shortDesc: Daya tells Jethalal that she is excited as Sundar is coming to Mumbai. Sundar asks his vendors to collect their dues from Jethalal. Watch all the latest videos of Taarak Mehta Ka Ooltah Chashmah online on SonyLiv official website SonyLiv.com

title: Ep 2210 - Sundar In Trouble
shortDesc: Sundar comes to Jethalal’s house and invites his family for the opening ceremony of his shop. Sundar tells Daya that he has forgotten to bring 2 lakh rupees to Mumbai.

title: Ep 2211 - Sundar Demands Money From Jethalal
shortDesc: Sundar demands 2 lakh rupees from Jethalal. Bagha tells Jethalal that he had taken twenty thousand rupees from Khanna’s manager. Bagha takes some money from Sundar.

title: Ep 2212 - Jethalal Fools Sundar
shortDesc: Sundar’s vendor demands two lakh rupees from him. Jethalal cleverly tells Sundar that he can not give him the required money. Watch all the latest videos of Taarak Mehta Ka Ooltah Chashmah online on SonyLiv official website SonyLiv.com

title: Ep 2213 - Sundar Makes Profit In His New Venture
shortDesc: Jethalal tells Daya that he has not given two lakh rupees to Sundar. Later, Sundar calls Jethalal tells him that he has made profits by selling his products to a businessman in a moving train.

title: Ep 2214 - Atmaram Meets Gotyas Mother
shortDesc: Atmaram Bhide meets Gotya’s hot-tempered mother Mangutai. Mangutai tells Atmaram Bhide that he will be held responsible for Gotya’s exam marks.

title: Ep 2215 - Atmaram Waits For Gotyas Exam Results
shortDesc: Atmaram tells Madhavi that he is eagerly waiting for Gotya’s exam results. Atmaram’s neighbours assure him that his students will pass their examination.

title: Ep 2216 - Mangutai Demands Money From Atmaram
shortDesc: Mangutai comes to Gokuldham Society and angrily asks Atmaram the reason for Gotya’s failure in his exams. Atmaram and his neighbours try to calm her down. Mangutai demands five lakh rupees from Atmaram.

title: Ep 2217 - Atmaram Decides To Give Money To Mangutai
shortDesc: Jethalal gives a cheque of five lakh rupees to Atmaram. Sodhi and his neighbours advise Atmaram to not give his hard-earned money to Mangutai. Watch all the latest videos of Taarak Mehta Ka Ooltah Chashmah online on SonyLiv official website SonyLiv

title: Ep 2218 - Atmaram Refuses To Give Moneyt To Mangutai
shortDesc: Mangutai comes to Gokuldham society and demands money from Atmaram Bhide. Jethalal tells Mangutai that Atmaram had asked Gotya to study seriously. Gotya admits before his mother that he did not concentrate on his studies in the earlier year.

title: Ep 2219 - Gotya Apologizes To Bhide
shortDesc: Atmaram’s neighbours tell Mangutai that her son should take personal responsibility for study. Gotya apologizes to Atmaram for his mistake. He assures Atmaram that he would concentrate on his studies going forwad.

title: Ep 2220 - Mysterious Person Calls Jethalal And Friends
shortDesc:
A mysterious person calls Jethalal and his neighbours at night. He asks them to come to society compound.

title: Ep 2221 - Jethalals Mysterious Call
shortDesc: Jethalal gets a call in the middle of the night and comes looking for his father. Not finding his father he calls out loud. His father appears and asks the cause of Jethalal's tension. Jethalal thinks that the mischief has been caused by Tappu.

title: Ep 2222 - Mystery Man Calls Asit Modi To Gokuldham Society
shortDesc: A person calls Asit Modi and asks him to come to Gokuldham society. Jethalal calls Inspector Chalu Pandey and requests him to protect his society from a possible attack.
